alert.note: Alert for Northern Rosebud (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued July 19 at 2:52AM MDT until July 19 at 2:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Northern Rosebud. * WHEN...Until 2 PM MDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and damage power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Warm, dry, and windy conditions could cause rapid fire spread with any fire starts. Use caution with any burning activities.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution and consider postponing travel until winds subside, or take an alternate route.
